title: IModelViewManager.DisplayWindowFromHandle
description: Displays a .NET control in this model view.
signature:
System.Boolean DisplayWindowFromHandle( 
   System.String
Name
,
   System.Int32
WindowHandle
,
   System.Boolean
SplitWindow
)

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: User-defined label that appears on the tab

parameters.name: SplitWindow
parameters.description: True to add a splitter window, false to not

returns: True if .NET control is created, false if not
remarks:
If your application must be x64 compatible, then use
IModelViewManager::DisplayWindowFromHandlex64
.
